messages.1000072292: Generates Guardian's Grace whenever you defend against an enemy's attack.\n#yEach Guardian's Grace increases STR and INT by {0}% (Can be stacked up to {1} times)
messages.1000096355:
Crash down into the ground from above, damaging and stunning any enemies in the shock wave. Generates Threat and hit enemies' Damage decreases. Press the #yJump Key#w while in midair to use this skill.
#yLight Magic
Physical Damage: {0}%
Can be used in the air
#yEnemy Damage: -{1}%
Duration {2} sec
messages.1000085222:
Use this skill to obtain additional #yGuardian's Grace#w and move while assuming a #ydefensive stance#w.
You will deal damage equal to your Physical Damage and increase your counterattack range when blocking an enemy attack. 
When you stand still or move forward or back while in a #ydefensive stance#w, you can jump using the #yjump key#w. When you move to the left or right while in a #ydefensive stance#w, you can use the #yjump key#w to cancel the defensive stance.
#yAerial Block#w is automatically activated when you jump.
#y
#yDefensive Damage Reflect: 100% of Physical Damage
Earns {0} Guardian's Grace
messages.1000072300: Imbues counterattacks with Light damage. After a counterattack, press the regular attack button to fire a bolt of light in front. Grants invincibility while firing.\n#yDamage per Bolt: {0}% of Physical Damage
messages.1000072304: Deals constant damage to nearby enemies while Divine Punishment is active.\n#yLight Magic\nDamage per Hit: {0}% of Physical Damage
messages.1000059055: After blocking an enemy attack, gain #y{1}%#w Physical Damage for #y{0} sec#w.\n#yCooldown: {2} sec
messages.1000076727: Enhances Falling Angel. Launches enemies into the air and pulls them down to the ground to smash them. However, you cannot launch enemies when using the jump key. \n#y Launch Damage: {0}%

#yDivine Barrier#w restores #yIron Will#w cooldown by {0} sec.

messages.1000085223:
Use this skill to obtain additional #yGuardian's Grace#w and move while assuming a #ydefensive stance#w.
You will deal damage equal to your Physical Damage and increase your counterattack range when blocking an enemy attack. Additionally grants #yDivine Ascension#w and #yDivine Vengeance#w while on #ydefense#w.
When you stand still or move forward or back while in a #ydefensive stance#w, you can jump using the #yjump key#w. When you move to the left or right in a #ydefensive stance#w, you can use the #yjump key#w to cancel the defensive stance.
#yAerial Block#w is automatically activated when you jump.
#y
#yDefensive Damage Reflect: {0}% of Physical Damage
Earns {1} Guardian's Grace
